sense.def:
An imitation
je kopija nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: Computers so far are just bad imitations of our brains.

sense.def:
To give an imitation of someone
pomeni posnemati, kako nekdo govori ali se vede.

seg.quote: ‘Come here, my dear,’ she said, giving a reasonable imitation of Isabel Travers.
Boys can be seen to pat one another on the head in imitation of what their fathers do.

sense.def:
Kar je
imitation
, ni izvirno, temveč je samo narejeno tako, da je videti pristno.

seg.quote: ...a pocket diary bound in black imitation leather.
